info.name: Marketplace Rental API
info.description: Complete API collection for the clothing rental marketplace platform

body.message: Registration successful. Please verify your email.

phone_number: Phone number must be in format: +1XXXXXXXXXX
email: The email must be a valid email address.
password: The password must be at least 8 characters.
terms_accepted: You must accept the terms of service

request.description: Sends a verification code to the provided phone number. In test mode, use +14155552671 as the test number.

phone_number: Phone number must be in E.164 format (e.g., +14155552671)

request.description: Verifies the code sent to the user's phone. The phone number is optional and will be retrieved from session if not provided. For testing in test mode, use the code '000000'.
Resends a verification code to the authenticated user's phone number. Requires authentication.
Check if an email or phone number is available for registration

body.message: Both email and phone number are available

request.description: Request a password reset code to be sent to the user's email

body.message: Password reset code sent to your email
No user found with that email address

request.description: Reset password using the code sent to the user's email
Refresh the user's authentication token
Get balance for a specific user
Get transaction history for a specific user

data.description: Rental payment received for Designer Dress

request.description: Get the currently authenticated user's complete profile data

query.description: ID of the size within the size_type
Search in title, description, brand name, and category name
Sort options: price_asc, price_desc, date_asc, date_desc, title_asc, title_desc

request.description: Get a paginated list of products with comprehensive filtering options

formdata.value: Vintage style denim jacket, perfect condition

request.description: Create a new product with images using form-data
Get a list of all possible offer statuses (pending, accepted, rejected, cancelled, expired, withdrawn)
Get a paginated list of offers with filters. Note: user_id and owner_id are automatically set based on authenticated user's role unless they are a super admin.
Get a specific offer by ID
Create a new offer for a product
Update an offer's status (pending, accepted, rejected, cancelled, expired, withdrawn)

query.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)

request.description: Get a paginated list of offers sent by the authenticated user

query.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)

request.description: Get a paginated list of offers received for the authenticated user's products
Confirms a rental. Both renter and owner must confirm before the rental becomes active.

body.message: You have already confirmed this rental.
